release.action: ASGARD - JIAC V Agent Platform Monitor - 3D!
AgentUnit - Unit testing of JIAC V agent services made easier.
Deployment of JADL scripts now uses load distribution.
Integration of IRML user management as basic service module with flexible user agent authentication and authorisation of JIAC actions.
A gateway for reliable host name resolution for agent discovery and inter-agent communication.
OWL support in JADL++ interpreter and service matcher.
A service matcher matching OWL-S service descriptions.

Rule engine API and Drools support has been extracted from JIAC and established as own independent module for use in other DAI-Labor projects without JIAC. Integration of ruleengine into JIAC agents is now build on top of it.
Enhanced execution cycle now supports parallel action execution.
Services are now reliably discovered if they are there, also cross-node.
SessionIds are now passed down to sub-services during service usage.

Additionally to the normal source and test code structure a site will be created which provides basic information about the module on the one hand, and information about the quality of the module on the other.
You may now log your changes in a ChangeLog using this changes.xml. A report will be generated automatically and integrated in the site.
